caption:
SCOOPS FOR A CAUSE

This May, every scoop of Earl Grey Tea does more than taste good—it does good. 

A portion of proceeds from every Earl Grey Tea scoop sold in scoop shops this month will benefit the Glioblastoma Research Organization in honor of Brain Tumor Awareness Month. 

“Earl Grey is perfect for this initiative – it is not only delicious but also represents the cancer ribbon color for glioblastoma and brain cancer”, says GBMRO founder @ajete

📍NYC friends: Join us May 7 from 4–6PM at our 73rd & 3rd shop for a special scooping event with @ajete and @benwvl

LOOKS GOOD. TASTES GOOD. DOES GOOD.
